alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Hall; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:40PM CDT until June 15 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Adams County in south central Nebraska... Central Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Southern Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1140 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Heartwell, or 10 miles southeast of Kearney, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Heartwell around 1145 PM CDT. Kenesaw around 1155 PM CDT. Prosser around 1200 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Juniata, Hastings, Doniphan and Hansen. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 270 and 317. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
